title: suggestion for a cyrillic font that resembles Papyrus
content:
Slightly embarassed to ask this  
but does anyone have a suggestion of a cyrillic font that looks similar to Papyrus?  
thanks again loads for the help.  
PJ
author: pigeoninpjs

comments.content: Hi, PJ, hopefully this will be of (not too belated) help to you, I found it in search of just the same. The font is called Avatar and is in fact a cyrillized Papyrus: [http://ihateyouare.deviantart.com/art/Papyrus-Plain-Cyrillic-165111766](http://web.archive.org/web/20150328232420/http:/ihateyouare.deviantart.com/art/Papyrus-Plain-Cyrillic-165111766)
